location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Captain Philip Howard Colomb

physicalDescription.extent: Watermark: The paper contains the watermark 'C Millington, London, 1867'.

mods.abstract: Letter thanking Colomb for his assistance in the Gulf and informing him that Hugh Rosedeparts shortly for Bombay and that Dalhousieis being sent there in her place.The letter goes onto discuss a meeting that Colomb had with some Russians and requesting the full facts of the meeting and matters discussed for his report.
